text: @NYGovCuomo You are the #NY STATE Governor not the NY CITY Mayor!! We are in this together but NY is tired of hearing @ cleaning subways & the $millions going to the richest city in the country when small towns & cities in your state truly suffer!!! #GovCuomo #CoronaVirus #COVID19 #NYStrong
